about_the_game:
Player will receive 3 special cups at the battle arena. These 3 special cups have extra challenges, better rewards and unique trophies

==================================================================================

Pemain akan mendapatkan akses ke 3 pertandingan baru di arena pertarungan. 3 pertandingan baru ini memiliki tantangan yang lebih menarik, hadiah yang lebih banyak dan piala yang unik
detailed_description:
Player will receive 3 special cups at the battle arena. These 3 special cups have extra challenges, better rewards and unique trophies

==================================================================================

Pemain akan mendapatkan akses ke 3 pertandingan baru di arena pertarungan. 3 pertandingan baru ini memiliki tantangan yang lebih menarik, hadiah yang lebih banyak dan piala yang unik
name: Monster Museum - Special Cups

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Player will receive 3 special cups at the battle arena. These 3 special cups have extra challenges, better rewards and unique trophies
